title: Resident Evil 3: Nemesis 2020 Remake Rumored - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.22.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/games now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Hurry to http://upstart.com/KFGAMES to find out HOW
LOW your Upstart rate is!

Go to http://getquip.com/games right now and you’ll get your first refill FREE.

Imran and Fran speculate on what's next for Resident Evil, the next-gen, and rank Star Wars games for a slow news day. 

Time Stamps - 
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
London is a thing! That’s happening??
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Zack Parsley, Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:02:45 - Sources: Resident Evil 3 Remake Coming 2020 (Eurogamer by Tom Phillips)
00:17:55 - Hot off the press of the rumor wheel is that we will have a resident evil 3 nemesis remake next year, which after the remake of 2, bodes well for us. It hasn't been a year since re2 remake released so I'm wondering if the new game has been in the works for longer than we imagined and is getting the TLC it deserves, or if it's going to be a rush job after the tasting that sweet sweet success. - Best Friends Q: Frankfurtter
00:21:12 - Final Fantasy 14 Director Wants to Release the Game on PlayStation 5 (IGN by Matt Kim)
Big Topic:
00:29:02 - Let’s Just Fucking Rank Every Notable Star Wars Video Game
00:53:20 - Out today
00:54:55 -  THIRDLOVE
00:56:19 -  QUIP
00:57:31 - UPSTART
 Reader mail   -
00:58:44 - With the upcoming release of PS5 and Xbox Scarlet, when do you think Sony and Microsoft will shut down the stores on the PS3 and Xbox 360?  - 2038 Pokémon CEO
01:02:10 - How can we declare a "winner of the generation" when Xbox's console sales numbers will clearly be less than normal because they are going to be much more prevalent everywhere else? Can we just compare apples to oranges between Xbox, Sony, and Nintendo? Or, with Xbox being so accessible, will people move away from the notion of a "winner" and have fun playing games again for the sake of having fun? - The Nano Biologist
01:07:13 - Squad Up: William Wolfgang(Stadia) - KingWolfgang
01:10:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Monday: Imran and Fran
Tuesday: Imran and Whitta
Gamescast: Imran, Fran, Andy; Call-In show for Patreon
